column3: School of Architecture, Design and the Built Environment
column5: Construction is a global industry and construction managers play a crucial role at the heart of it.They're responsible for directing operations within building projects - from project planning, contract administration and safety management, through to cost and quality control. Our MSc Construction Management course provides you with a framework for understanding the unique role of a construction manager, with a key focus on the management of construction projects from the perspective of the construction contractor.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
